main.docTitle: Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes (Compensation Claims) Rules

section.name: s2
section.heading: Definition
section.def: In these Rules, section 17B application (第17B條申請) means an application mentioned in section 17B(1) of the Ordinance.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Rules of High Court apply to section 17B applications
section.content: The Rules of the High Court (Cap. 4 sub. leg. A) apply to a section 17B application to the extent that those Rules are not inconsistent with these Rules.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Requirements as to making of section 17B applications

subsection.content: A section 17B application must be made by originating summons.

subsection.leadIn: A section 17B application must be accompanied by—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a report containing the information mentioned in section 185 of the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes (General) Regulation (Cap. 485 sub. leg. A); and (E.R. 4 of 2019)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: an affidavit of a designated person as defined by section 6F(5) of the Ordinance. (40 of 2021 s. 109)

subsection.leadIn: The affidavit referred to in subrule (2)(b) must—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: verify the contents of the report referred to in subrule (2)(a); and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: state the deponent’s belief in the matters mentioned in section 17B(1)(a), (b) and (c) of the Ordinance.

subsection.content: A section 17B application must also contain such information, and be accompanied by such other documents, as may be required by the Ordinance.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Authority to apply to Court for directions
section.leadIn: As soon as practicable after issuing an originating summons for a section 17B application, the Authority must apply to the Court for directions as to—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: who should be added as a party to the proceedings; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: who should receive notice of the proceedings.
